div.div: Carroll Univ. vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: St. Norbert wins toss and defers. Carroll will receive north end.
SThompsonMeyers kickoff 65 yards to the CU00, touchback.
Daniel Arden rush for 5 yards to the CU30 (Tony Altmann).
Kyle Burlingame rush for 7 yards to the CU37.
Kyle Burlingame rush for 7 yards to the CU44 (Tony Altmann; Jerry Blake).
